Meta-Skills

Philosophy

Engineering Intelligence, Not Just Text.

üìä

Context-Optimized

We enforce concise SKILL.md files (<500 lines). Agents get confused when you shout 5,000 lines of documentation at them.

tokens.totaloptimized
üíª

IDE-Aware

Our generated skills understand absolute paths, task_boundary, and local environments. They know where they live.

$ pwd
/users/agent/workspace
‚úÖ

Self-Verifying

Includes built-in QA checklists. The agent must check its own work before it tells you "I'm done."

Syntax check passed
Logic verified
Tests green
The Vision
"Unlike simple scaffolding scripts, this tool enforces a way of working that treats AI agents as team members, not just text generators."
Y
Y.D. Nikolaev
Creator, Antigravity Factory
Core Principles
01

Agents need boundaries

Limit the scope. Provide clear exit criteria. Don't let them wander into infinite loops.

02

Documentation is Interface

Your markdown files are the UI for your AI. Treat them with the same care as your React components.

03

Human in the Loop

Automation shouldn't be a black box. The Factory invites you to inspect, override, and improve.

Choose Your Blueprint

Pick a preset that matches your project. Mix and match as needed.

$factory install --preset=all
